00053 GLint Texture::Load(const char *texname, int textype, const char *filename, int texmode,
00054     GLfloat intensity, GLfloat tileX, GLfloat tileY, bool mipmap, bool aniso, GLint cache)
00055 {
00057     if(cache != -1)
00058     {
00059         m_texID = cache;
00060     }
00061     else      //load texture from file
00062     {
00063         if(!LoadTGA(filename))
00064             return ERR;
00065 
00066         //texture generation
00067         glGenTextures(1, &m_texID);
00068         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, m_texID);
00069 
00070         //texture with anisotropic filtering
00071         if(aniso)
00072         {
00073             //find out, if GFX supports aniso filtering
00074             if(!GLEW_EXT_texture_filter_anisotropic)
00075             {
00076                 cout<<"Anisotropic filtering not supported. Using linear instead.\n";
00077             }
00078             else
00079             {
00080                 float maxAnisotropy;
00081                 //find out maximum supported anisotropy
00082                 glGetFloatv(GL_MAX_TEXTURE_MAX_ANISOTROPY_EXT, &maxAnisotropy);
00083                 glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAX_ANISOTROPY_EXT, maxAnisotropy);
00084             }
00085         }
00086         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D,GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER,GL_LINEAR);
00087         //mip-mapped texture (if set)
00088         if(mipmap)
00089             glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D,GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER,GL_LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR);
00090         else
00091             glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D,GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER,GL_LINEAR);
00092 
00093         if(textype == BUMP)     //don't compress bump maps
00094 #ifdef _LINUX_
00095             glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGB, m_width, m_height, 0, GL_BGR, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, m_imageData);
00096 #else
00097             glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGB, m_width, m_height, 0, GL_RGB, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, m_imageData);
00098 #endif
00099         else                                    //compress color maps
00100 #ifdef _LINUX_
00101             glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_COMPRESSED_RGB, m_width, m_height, 0, GL_BGR, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, m_imageData);
00102 #else
00103             glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_COMPRESSED_RGB, m_width, m_height, 0, GL_RGB, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, m_imageData);
00104 #endif
00105         glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_REPEAT);
00106         glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_REPEAT);
00107         if(mipmap)
00108             glGenerateMipmap(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00109 
00110         delete [] m_imageData;      //don't need image data after texture was created
00111     }
00112 
00113     //texture mode and type
00114     m_texname = texname;
00115     m_textype = textype;
00116     m_texmode = texmode;
00117     m_tileX = tileX;
00118     m_tileY = tileY;
00119     m_intensity = intensity;
00120 
00121     //cout<<"Texture \""<<texname<<"\" creation OK\n";
00122 
00123     return m_texID;
00124 }

00143 GLint Texture::Load(const char *texname, int textype,
00144     const char **cube_files, int texmode, GLfloat intensity, GLfloat tileX, GLfloat tileY, bool aniso, GLint cache)
00145 {
00147     if(cache != -1)
00148     {
00149         m_texID = cache;
00150     }
00151     else      //load texture from file
00152     {
00153         //texture generation
00154         glGenTextures(1, &m_texID);
00155         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP, m_texID);
00156 
00157         //load 6 images for cube map
00158         for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
00159         {
00160             if(!LoadTGA(cube_files[i]))
00161                 return ERR;
00162 
00163             //texture with anisotropic filtering
00164             if(aniso)
00165             {
00166                 //find out, if GFX supports aniso filtering
00167                 if(!GLEW_EXT_texture_filter_anisotropic)
00168                 {
00169                     cout<<"Anisotropic filtering not supported. Using linear instead.\n";
00170                 }
00171                 else
00172                 {
00173                     float maxAnisotropy;
00174                     //find out maximum supported anisotropy
00175                     glGetFloatv(GL_MAX_TEXTURE_MAX_ANISOTROPY_EXT, &maxAnisotropy);
00176                     glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_X + i, GL_TEXTURE_MAX_ANISOTROPY_EXT, maxAnisotropy);
00177                 }
00178             }
00179 
00180             //mip-mapped texture
00181             glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_X + i, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER,GL_LINEAR);
00182             glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_X + i, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER,GL_LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR);
00183 #ifdef _LINUX_
00184             glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_X + i, 0, GL_COMPRESSED_RGB, m_width, m_height, 0, GL_BGR, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, m_imageData);
00185 #else
00186             glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_X + i, 0, GL_COMPRESSED_RGB, m_width, m_height, 0, GL_RGB, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, m_imageData);
00187 #endif
00188             //@todo: nefunguje s cube maps:  glGenerateMipmap(GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_X + i);
00189 #ifdef _LINUX_
00190             gluBuild2DMipmaps(GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_X + i, 3, m_width,m_height, GL_BGR, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE,m_imageData);
00191 #else
00192             gluBuild2DMipmaps(GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_X + i, 3, m_width,m_height, GL_RGB, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE,m_imageData);
00193 #endif
00194 
00195             delete [] m_imageData;      //don't need image data after texture was created
00196         }
00197     }
00198 
00199     //texture mode and type
00200     m_texname = texname;
00201     m_textype = textype;
00202     m_texmode = texmode;
00203     m_tileX = tileX;
00204     m_tileY = tileY;
00205     m_intensity = intensity;
00206 
00207     //cout<<"Texture \""<<texname<<"\" creation OK\n";
00208 
00209     return m_texID;
00210 }

00220 bool Texture::LoadTGA(const char* filename)
00221 {
00222     FILE* fTGA;                                                                                 //file
00223     int type;
00224 
00225     GLubyte tgaheader[12];                             //TGA header
00226 
00227     //headers: for compressed and for uncompressed images
00228     GLubyte uTGAcompare[12] = { 0,0, 2,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0 };
00229     GLubyte cTGAcompare[12] = { 0,0,10,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0 };
00230 
00231     //open file
00232     fTGA = fopen(filename, "rb");
00233     if(fTGA == NULL)
00234     {
00235         string err = "Can't open texture file ";
00236         err += filename;
00237         err += " !";
00238         ShowMessage(err.c_str(), false);
00239         return false;
00240     }
00241 
00242     cout<<"Loading image "<<filename<<"...";
00243 
00245     if(fread(&tgaheader, 12, 1, fTGA) == 0)
00246     {
00247         ShowMessage("Can't read image header!");
00248         if(fTGA != NULL) fclose(fTGA);
00249         return false;
00250     }
00251 
00253     if(memcmp(uTGAcompare, &tgaheader, sizeof(tgaheader)) == 0)
00254         type = UNCOMPRESSED;
00255     else if(memcmp(cTGAcompare, &tgaheader, sizeof(tgaheader)) == 0)
00256         type = COMPRESSED;
00257     //else error
00258     else
00259     {
00260         ShowMessage("Unknown TGA image type!");
00261         fclose(fTGA);
00262         return false;
00263     }
00264 
00265     //read further bytes of header
00266     if(fread(tgaheader, 6, 1, fTGA) == 0)
00267     {
00268         ShowMessage("Can't read image header!");
00269         if(fTGA != NULL) fclose(fTGA);
00270         return false;
00271     }
00272 
00274     m_width = tgaheader[1] * 256 + tgaheader[0];
00275     m_height = tgaheader[3] * 256 + tgaheader[2];
00276     m_bpp = tgaheader[4];
00277 
00278     cout<<m_width<<"x"<<m_height<<"x"<<m_bpp<<"...";
00279 
00280     //check values
00281     if((m_width <= 0) || (m_height <= 0) || ((m_bpp != 24) && (m_bpp != 32)) )
00282     {
00283         ShowMessage("Unknown TGA image type!");
00284         if(fTGA != NULL) fclose(fTGA);
00285         return false;
00286     }
00287     /*
00288     //set color depth
00289     int gl_textype;
00290     if(m_bpp == 24)
00291     gl_textype = GL_RGB;
00292     else
00293     gl_textype = GL_RGBA;
00294     */
00296     unsigned bytesPerPixel = (m_bpp / 8);
00297     unsigned imageSize = (bytesPerPixel * m_width * m_height);
00298     m_imageData = new GLubyte[imageSize];
00299     if(m_imageData == NULL)
00300     {
00301         ShowMessage("Can't allocate image data!");
00302         fclose(fTGA);
00303         return false;
00304     }
00305 
00307     if(type == UNCOMPRESSED)
00308     {
00310         if(fread(m_imageData, 1, imageSize, fTGA) != imageSize)
00311         {
00312             ShowMessage("Can't read image data!");
00313             if(m_imageData != NULL) delete [] m_imageData;
00314             fclose(fTGA);
00315             return false;
00316         }
00317 #ifndef _LINUX_
00318         //conversion from BGR to RGB
00319         for(unsigned cswap = 0; cswap < imageSize; cswap += bytesPerPixel)
00320             m_imageData[cswap] ^= m_imageData[cswap+2] ^= m_imageData[cswap] ^= m_imageData[cswap+2];
00321 #endif
00322     }
00323 
00325     else if(type == COMPRESSED)
00326     {
00327         GLuint pixelcount = m_height * m_width;                 //pixel count
00328         GLuint currentpixel = 0;                                        //actual pixel
00329         GLuint currentbyte = 0;                                         //actual byte
00330 
00331         //allocate memory for image pixel
00332         GLubyte* colorbuffer = new GLubyte[bytesPerPixel];
00333         if(colorbuffer == NULL)
00334         {
00335             ShowMessage("Can't allocate color buffer data!");
00336             fclose(fTGA);
00337             return false;
00338         }
00339 
00340         do
00341         {
00342             //find out header type: RLE or RAW
00343             GLubyte chunkheader = 0;
00344             if(fread(&chunkheader, sizeof(GLubyte), 1, fTGA) == 0)
00345             {
00346                 ShowMessage("Can't read RLE header!");
00347                 if(fTGA != NULL) fclose(fTGA);
00348                 if(m_imageData != NULL) delete [] m_imageData;
00349                 if(colorbuffer != NULL) delete [] colorbuffer;
00350                 return false;
00351             }
00352 
00353             //1. RAW part of file
00354             if(chunkheader < 128)
00355             {
00356                 chunkheader++;                          //count pixels before other header
00357                 //nactavame kazdy pixel
00358                 for(short counter = 0; counter < chunkheader; counter++)
00359                 {
00360                     if(fread(colorbuffer, 1, bytesPerPixel, fTGA) != bytesPerPixel)
00361                     {
00362                         ShowMessage("Can't read image data!");
00363                         if(fTGA != NULL) fclose(fTGA);
00364                         if(colorbuffer != NULL) delete [] colorbuffer;
00365                         if(m_imageData != NULL) delete [] m_imageData;
00366                         return false;
00367                     }
00368                     //write to memory, conversion to RGB
00369 #ifdef _LINUX_
00370                     m_imageData[currentbyte] = colorbuffer[0];
00371                     m_imageData[currentbyte + 1] = colorbuffer[1];
00372                     m_imageData[currentbyte + 2] = colorbuffer[2];
00373 #else
00374                     m_imageData[currentbyte] = colorbuffer[2];
00375                     m_imageData[currentbyte + 1] = colorbuffer[1];
00376                     m_imageData[currentbyte + 2] = colorbuffer[0];
00377 #endif
00379                     //if(bytesPerPixel == 4) m_imageData[currentbyte + 3] = colorbuffer[3];
00380                     //move to next byte
00381                     currentbyte += bytesPerPixel;
00382                     currentpixel++;
00383 
00384                     //check pixel count, if it's according to image dimensions
00385                     if(currentpixel > pixelcount)
00386                     {
00387                         ShowMessage("Wrong image format - too many pixels.");
00388                         if(fTGA != NULL) fclose(fTGA);
00389                         if(colorbuffer != NULL) delete [] colorbuffer;
00390                         if(m_imageData != NULL) delete [] m_imageData;
00391                         return false;
00392                     }
00393                 }
00394             }
00395             //2. RLE part of image
00396             else
00397             {
00398                 chunkheader -= 127;                                             //pixel count in section
00399                 //read pixel after pixel
00400                 if(fread(colorbuffer, 1, bytesPerPixel, fTGA) != bytesPerPixel)
00401                 {
00402                     ShowMessage("Can't read image data!");
00403                     if(fTGA != NULL) fclose(fTGA);
00404                     if(colorbuffer != NULL) delete [] colorbuffer;
00405                     if(m_imageData != NULL) delete [] m_imageData;
00406                     return false;
00407                 }
00408                 //pixel copy
00409                 for(short counter = 0; counter < chunkheader; counter++)
00410                 {
00411                     //write to memory, conversion to RGB
00412 #ifdef _LINUX_
00413                     m_imageData[currentbyte] = colorbuffer[0];
00414                     m_imageData[currentbyte + 1] = colorbuffer[1];
00415                     m_imageData[currentbyte + 2] = colorbuffer[2];
00416 #else
00417                     m_imageData[currentbyte] = colorbuffer[2];
00418                     m_imageData[currentbyte + 1] = colorbuffer[1];
00419                     m_imageData[currentbyte + 2] = colorbuffer[0];
00420 #endif
00421                     //TODO: alpha channel
00422                     //if(bytesPerPixel == 4) m_imageData[currentbyte + 3] = colorbuffer[3];
00423                     //move to next byte
00424                     currentbyte += bytesPerPixel;
00425                     currentpixel++;
00426 
00427                     //check pixel count, if it's according to image dimensions
00428                     if(currentpixel > pixelcount)
00429                     {
00430                         ShowMessage("Wrong image format - too many pixels.");
00431                         if(fTGA != NULL) fclose(fTGA);
00432                         if(colorbuffer != NULL) delete [] colorbuffer;
00433                         if(m_imageData != NULL) delete [] m_imageData;
00434                         return false;
00435                     }
00436                 }
00437             }
00438         }while(currentpixel < pixelcount);
00439 
00440         //clear up memory
00441         if(colorbuffer != NULL) delete [] colorbuffer;
00442     }
00443 
00444     //done
00445     fclose(fTGA);
00446     cout<<"OK\n";
00447     return true;
00448 }

00457 void Texture::ActivateTexture(GLint tex_unit, bool set_uniforms)
00458 {
00460     if(set_uniforms)
00461     {
00462         glUniform1f(m_tileXLoc, m_tileX);
00463         glUniform1f(m_tileYLoc, m_tileY);
00464         glUniform1f(m_intensityLoc, m_intensity);
00465     }
00466     //texture location must be updated regularly
00467     if(m_texLoc >= 0)
00468         glUniform1i(m_texLoc, tex_unit);
00469 
00471     glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0 + tex_unit);
00472     //Various texture targets
00473     if(m_textype == CUBEMAP || m_textype == CUBEMAP_ENV)        //for cube map
00474         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP, m_texID);
00475     else if(m_textype == SHADOW_OMNI)                         //for texture array
00476         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D_ARRAY, m_texID);
00477     else if(m_textype == RENDER_TEXTURE_MULTISAMPLE)          //for multisampled texture
00478         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D_MULTISAMPLE, m_texID);
00479     else                                                    //for regular 2D texture
00480         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, m_texID);
00481 }
00482 
00488 void Texture::GetUniforms(GLuint shader)
00489 {
00490     if(HasTiles())
00491     {
00492         string tileX_str = m_texname + "_tileX";
00493         string tileY_str = m_texname + "_tileY";
00494         m_tileXLoc = glGetUniformLocation(shader,tileX_str.c_str() );
00495         m_tileYLoc = glGetUniformLocation(shader,tileY_str.c_str() );
00496     }
00497 
00499     string intensity_str = m_texname + "_intensity";
00500 
00502     m_texLoc = glGetUniformLocation(shader,m_texname.c_str());
00503     m_intensityLoc = glGetUniformLocation(shader,intensity_str.c_str() );
00504 }
